documents.document: Any concern that putting weapons back in the hands of the mentally ill was this close to the top of their to do list? All good with that?
@RepStephMurphy I'm Canadian so don't have a vote in the matter, but thank you for putting this bill forward.
World's a mess? Check. Distrust and disappointment in our leaders? Check. Moving forwards anyways? Yup. Must be Groundhog Day.
@DefLeppard my six year old son is really hoping for Rocket at the Vancouver show. Can you hook a kid up for his first rock show?
@SamHulick Cool, I'll have to spend time digging into ReelCrafter, and congrats on getting this off the ground, it looks really great!
.@Amazon: join 750+ corporations & stop advertising w/ Breitbart. Breitbart's brand of bigotry is bad for business. https://t.co/JzmmVhoYg8
@SamHulick @ReelCrafter I haven't been doing video reels in the last while, but when I do it's usually Vimeo.
Do it. We've seen what Twitter can do in the wrong hands, it's time to take the power back. https://t.co/bXFZHFDegj
@elonmusk, after what we've seen from those put in power lately, I'm not so sure we deserve to be a multi-planet species. But keep going!
Man, doing a convincing 1940's big band with MIDI is really hard. That must've been why they used to use real musicians back then.
@mpattimusic the other 20% is patiently watching Transformers transform and trying to act impressed...again.
"Spurs coach Popovich blasts President Trump (Yahoo Sports)". Gotta love Coach Pop. Hits it right on the head https://t.co/JEmABr9DvV
The truth? It's all an elaborate Russian conspiracy to put Yakov Smirnoff back on top.
There's an 85% chance that the 1st time he addresses the nation, "My fellow Americans" will be replaced with "People of planet Houston..."
@tkedmunds73 He's leaving you no choice. https://t.co/Br9iX5DeYf
Oh, could he ever sing. #RIPGeorge
@MAURICELAMARCHE Great conversation with @SammLevine on KPCS, and thanks for telling the Dalai Lama story, that was pretty great.
Beautiful tribute to Craig Sager by @SteveKerr and @warriors. Classy, touching and appropriate. Gave me goosebumps.
@NBA You'll be missed Sages. #SagerStrong
@JamesBondingPOD What are the odds that U2's Hold Me, Thrill Me, Kiss Me, Kill Me wasn't pitched for Goldeneye, also in 1995? 1%? 2%?
#louisck was awesome tonight. What a great show.
@Ali_Sweeney After all the MSB corpses that show up around holidays, how nervous are your friends and family right now?
Been soaking in James Newton Howard's score for #FantasticBeasts for the last few days, reeeeeaaaallly good stuff.
Sorry to hear of the passing of Saki Kaskas, audio director on Sleeping Dogs. An extremely good and talented dude. He will be missed.
@RhodesPiano Hi folks, would you happen to know of someone in the Vancouver BC area who could repair a Rhodes Suitcase piano?
Anyone know of someone in the Vancouver area who'd be able to repair a Rhodes Suitcase piano?
@SpitfireAudio BEAUTIFUL job on Tundra, really looking forward to putting it to work!
Just re-watched the first Spider-Man, and decided that Trump is a less-informed J Jonah Jameson who has Green Goblin aspirations.
Congratulations @candacecbure @yannick_bisson @TheRealMarilu on another great #AuroraTeagarden!
I'd pay good money to hear Steven Tyler @IamStevenT play the part of King Louie in The Jungle Book. He's got some of Louis Prima's groove.
New music up at https://t.co/MQBdWTGs1P, from #MurderSheBaked, starring @Ali_Sweeney, @CameronMathison,@BarbaraNiven & @Hoganfilm. Enjoy!
Jon Voight has a lot of nerve calling the Trump abandoners "turncoats" after what he did to his IMF team.
Congrats to the #AutumnInTheVineyard cast & crew on the premiere! Here's some of the score, a pleasure to work on. https://t.co/3DK0RxHemL

I bet that an Oscars-style "Year in Memoriam" video on the GoPro YouTube channel would be spectacular.
@SpitfireAudio the new brass sounds fantastic!
Hot damn, the new @AdamsonBarry album is good.
It's a welcome feeling, when you start to get the sense that making your deadline is at least plausible.
@RachaelLCook beautiful work in Summer Love, thoroughly enjoyed working on it, and looking forward to Autumn in the Vineyard!
@ruthhill74 Hey Ruth, it's called Gonna Find My Way To You, by Dave Tough. Hope that helps! https://t.co/MzcH3IZotG
@ruthhill74 Hey Ruth, I'll have to check on that, let me get back to you.
@DebbieGibson Hey thanks! Nice work yourself!

Ahh, Metagrid... Where have you been all my life?
@orchetect the other 2% are the ladies.
@jonahray Great work on the MST reunion, looking forward to the show with you in the driver's seat!
Hey @HeitorPereira_ are there plans to release the Sonic Sea score? The cues you played on the Film Music Media chat sounded lovely!

Do we know for a fact that it's not ground up people in the taco bowl? Maybe he loves the FLAVOR of Hispanics. #CincoDeMayo
I'm obsessed with the idea of recasting C-3PO & R2D2 with KITT & Herbie the Love Bug. The Endor terrain will be a problem. We will overcome.
Wednesday I saw Paul McCartney, tonight was Bend Sinister. Rock & roll lives on...

@marcmaron Hey man, thoroughly enjoyed last night's show at the Vogue. The only thing missing was 2 minutes of blues guitar at the end.
@darrenkerwin That sounds pretty cool, good to keep things moving forward.
@darrenkerwin How about you, what've you been up to?
@darrenkerwin I've been doing a few MOWs, some trailer music, and just had The Marine 4 come out on video this past week. Good fun stuff.
@darrenkerwin It's pretty good, still have a few things to iron out, but it's a much better space.
@darrenkerwin Hey man, good to hear from you. Things are good here, keeping busy. How about you?
Hey folks, The Marine 4: Moving Target is out today for digital download. Check out the score here: #np https://t.co/colcaUIRkg
